name: Parcel Pursuit
description:
Mia was sent to deliver a package to the desert planet of Saropa, the furthest planet from the HD10180 sun. Space thieves attacked the planet and took the package, so now Mia needs to chase them down and take back the package so she can deliver it to the rightful owner.

She does not know what is in the package, just that it is her job to deliver it.

She chases the space thieves across the solar system from planet to planet.

Video: https://youtu.be/EqBX4nuf_Xw

Developed by Playsocket Productions

Josh Trusz - Programmer, Designer, Sound Effects

Isabela Ruiz - Artist, Designer, Writer
